|----------------------|

|                      |

|                      |

|    to not explode    |
|                      |
|                      |
|                      |
|----------------------|

|    kitten you get    |
|   to see where they  |
|        hide it       |
|                      |
|                      |
|----------------------|

|----------------------|
|                      |
|      SUPER SKIP      |
|                      |
|                      |
|                      |
|                      |

|    if you need to    |
|  take multiple turns |
|    skip them all     |
|                      |
|                      |
|----------------------|

|----------------------|
|                      |
|     FEED THE DEAD    |
|                      |
|                      |
|                      |
|                      |

|  (except you) must   |
|     give a card      |
|   to a dead player   |
|                      |
|                      |
|                      |
|----------------------|
